definition: name of district in Anhui/capital of Yin
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
"blade of grass" component in Chinese characters

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the chemical components of the essential oil of Angelica dahurica from Bozhou.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究亳白芷的挥发油化学成分。

sentences.english: If South Bo indeed existed, its culture should be Zhanghe type culture of the pre Shang culture.
sentences.chinese: 如果南亳确实存在，其文化应是漳河型一类先商文化。

sentences.english: Recognizes that Bo was in Da-pi, many problems in Shang history will be explained perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 亳在大亻丕，则商史许多问题皆可以通解。
没有实质帮助的忠告亳无用处。

sentences.english: Recognizes that bo was in da-pi many problems in shang history will be explained perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 亳在大亻丕，则商史许多问题皆可以通解。

sentences.english: She accepted my check without query.
sentences.chinese: 她亳无质疑的收下了我的支票。

definition: surname Ying/river in Henan and Anhui
grain husk/tip of sth short and slender
name of a river in Shandong
surname Pi/Han dynasty county in modern Jiangsu/also pr. [Pei2]
name of a district in Hebei
a thorny tree/sugarcane/Cudrania triloba/three-bristle cudrania (Cudrania tricuspidata)/Chinese mulberry (Cudrania)
